@tomer-openfin Thank you for submitting this PR!

***This is a live comment which I will keep updated.***

## 1 package in this PR

* `openfin` [on npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/openfin), [on unpkg](https://unpkg.com/browse/openfin@latest/) (author is owner)

## Code Reviews

Because this PR edits the configuration file, it can be merged once it's reviewed by a DT maintainer.

## Status

 * ✅ No merge conflicts
 * ❌ Continuous integration tests have finished
 * ❌ A DT maintainer needs to approve changes which affect module config files
